about_the_game:
A group of explorers receives an intriguing mission: to investigate an Egyptian tomb of the third Kingdom. Inside, they discover signs of an unknown civilization and technology that where supposed to protect a sealed ancient evil. What begins as a simple archaeological expedition quickly turns into a fight for survival against an ancient and formidable threat.


Team up to Survive the Ancient Tomb's Curse


Sanctua is a party game where players must collaborate to survive and escape a corrupted tomb. Teamwork is key to navigate deadly traps, cursed wildlife, and the Ancient guardian of these ever-shifting ruins.

But a darkness lurks within your group... One player is corrupted and transformed into an ancient entity who hunts and torments the others.

Find a way out, discover the mysteries of this lost mausoleum, gather clues and unlock the main gate before the corruption seal the place.

The Explorers - Discover, survive, and escape


Work together with your fellow explorers to unravel the mysteries of the tomb. Find and unlock the exit. Discover gadgets, and clues about how to use them effectively. Avoid traps, and noisy wildlife triggers. Stay silent, or the Ancient evil will hear you.

Use your environment to hide, and your wits to outsmart your foe.

Death is not the end; corruption is everywhere, and certain conditions can turn your body into a lifeless creature that can swing events one way or the other.


The Ancient - Protect, hunt, turn and eliminate


Conceal your curse, or not, before turning into the Ancient. The corruption is now your life source, and your obsession to protect your sacred chamber is boundless. Keep your corruption high to track, trap, and hunt down the explorers to neutralize or convert them.





Sanctua offers a new experience in each game, with a randomly generated tomb layout, random gadgets and mechanisms. Communication between players is the heart of the gameplay, amplified by immersive in-game voice chat.

It's easy-to-access but hard-to-master, with a wide range of actions, customizations, and replayability, making every game feel different and exciting.

Choose YOUR way to play and survive this cursed tomb! Discover the truth, or seal it forever, with... or against your friends.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.2Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (3.6 Ghz)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 3060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
